description: A representation of an Old School RuneScape (OSRS) item.
title: Item Properties

members.description: If the item is a members-only.

tradeable.description: If the item is tradeable (between players and on the GE).

tradeable_on_ge.description: If the item is tradeable (only on GE).

stackable.description: If the item is stackable (in inventory).

linked_id_item.description: The linked ID of the actual item (if noted/placeholder).

linked_id_noted.description: The linked ID of an item in noted form.

linked_id_placeholder.description: The linked ID of an item in placeholder form.

placeholder.description: If the item is a placeholder.

equipable.description: If the item is equipable (based on right-click menu entry).

equipable_by_player.description: If the item is equipable by a player and is equipable in-game.

cost.description: The store price of an item.

lowalch.description: The low alchemy value of the item (cost * 0.4).

highalch.description: The high alchemy value of the item (cost * 0.6).

weight.description: The weight (in kilograms) of the item.

buy_limit.description: The GE buy limit of the item.

quest_item.description: If the item is associated with a quest.

release_date.description: Date the item was released (in ISO8601 format).

duplicate.description: If the item is a duplicate.

examine.description: The examine text for the item.

wiki_name.description: The OSRS Wiki name for the item.

wiki_url.description: The OSRS Wiki URL (possibly including anchor link).

equipment.title: Item Equipment
equipment.description: The equipment bonuses of equipable armour/weapons.

attack_stab.description: The attack stab bonus of the item.

attack_slash.description: The attack slash bonus of the item.

attack_crush.description: The attack crush bonus of the item.

attack_magic.description: The attack magic bonus of the item.

attack_ranged.description: The attack ranged bonus of the item.

defence_stab.description: The defence stab bonus of the item.

defence_slash.description: The defence slash bonus of the item.

defence_crush.description: The defence crush bonus of the item.

defence_magic.description: The defence magic bonus of the item.

defence_ranged.description: The defence ranged bonus of the item.

melee_strength.description: The melee strength bonus of the item.

ranged_strength.description: The ranged strength bonus of the item.

magic_damage.description: The magic damage bonus of the item.

prayer.description: The prayer bonus of the item.

slot.description: The equipment slot associated with the item (e.g., head).

attack_speed.description: The attack speed of a weapon.

stances.description: An array of weapon stance information
